Question: They trailed 17–7 in the 2nd quarter before this person found Dallas Clark for a 2-yard TD to end the half 17–14.

After another Rosenfels fumble, this person threw the 5-yard game-winning TD pass to Reggie Wayne.
This person led the league with 4,267 passing yards and threw 29 touchdowns; he was named first-team All-Pro and to the Pro Bowl.
